messages.subject: gonna be a long night
messages.msgSnippet: Welllll..... It looks like we are hosting a Camp Out here.  We ve got the campfire going, and 2 tents set up in the yard where the boys will sleep. Now my 2
messages.messageBody:
Welllll.....

It looks like we are hosting a Camp Out here. We've got the campfire going, and 2 tents set up in the yard where the boys will sleep.

Now my 2 daughters are over across the street helping a couple of girls pack their things and they will be pitching two more tents, in the other yard. LOL.

I guess we'll have about 9 kids here altogether and there is at least one more who isn't planning to stay all night.

Goodness, I hope they are quiet tonight with it being Sunday night and all. People will be getting up early for work in the morning.

Should be interesting. I hope they behave!

Kristen




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
